705085f-a.title: Brooklyn: Jamaica Avenue - Miller Avenue
705085f-a.text:
231 Jamaica Ave., north side, between Miller Ave., and Van Siclen Court,
showing the apple orchard on Dr. Miller's Estate. The house at the left,
was Dr. Miller's residence. It was in existence prior to 1873, and still
stands in 1929.
About 1910.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
